name: AR Soccer Ultimate Hit
description:
AR Soccer ultimate hit augmented reality game uplifts the gaming adventure to a whole new level. Start new gaming chapter and convert your table into real time football stadium. This AR game has everything for your kids to have fun time. Just grab your phone and let the real fun begin. Move around and set the best angle to get best experience.
So download this amazing Wi-Fi free SportaculAR Football AR games with simple one touch gameplay. Let your kids play American football like a legend Soccer star and become Pro player. Roam around because this AR game will not let kids sit still.

Features:
• Best AR football sports game!
• Amazing Animations and HD graphics!
• Easy and user friendly controls!
• Real-time adventure of playing soccer!
• Simple single touch control. Tap and play football!
